guidanceItem.title: Users and administrators do not share accounts.
guidanceItem.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that no shared accounts are created for use by multiple individuals. Make sure that authorized individuals use their own accounts.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
